sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: lox2272
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Cre-mediated recombination occurs in the 8-bp core sequence (GGATACTT). lox2272 sites are compatible with each other, but incompatible with loxP or loxN sites (Lee and Saito, 1988).
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: lox2272

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: KRAB
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: KRAB
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:product: Kruppel-associated box (KRAB) transcriptional repression domain from the human zinc finger protein ZNF10 (Margolin et al., 1994)

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: loxP
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: loxP
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: Cre-mediated recombination occurs in the 8-bp core sequence (GCATACAT).

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:aPortionOfThisPlasmidWasDerivedF: Jonathan Weissman, pHR-SFFV-dCas9-BFP-KRAB plasmid #46911, Cre-Lox sites from Karl Deisseroth, pAAV-Ef1a-DIO EYFP plasmid #27056
sbol:ComponentDefinition.dcterms:description: An EFS driven inverted de-catalyzed SaCas9 fused to the transcription repressor KRAB. dSaCas9-KRAB is floxed to render the system cre-dependent..

sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:label: EF-1-alpha core promoter
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.dcterms:title: EF-1-alpha core promoter
sbol:SequenceAnnotation.gbConv:note: core promoter for human elongation factor EF-1-alpha

sbol:ComponentDefinition.addgene:purpose: An EFS driven inverted de-catalyzed SaCas9 fused to the transcription repressor KRAB. dSaCas9-KRAB is floxed to render the system cre-dependent.
